title: Xprim777
author: Xprim777
content: Hello, I would like to sell this Citadel21 Vol. 1 - #514/1000It's in very good condition overall. The only default is a scratch on the cover as you can see. https://ibb.co/album/NTQxcVStarting bid: 0.001 BTCMinimum bid increments : 0.0001 BTC End time : Monday 3rd July 2023, 23h UTC+2 (Paris time) - Countdown TimerSniping : Bids within 10 minutes before the auction end extend the auction for 10 minutes.Payment : 3DdCNPvM9JGvMawQzWhuCzTE4yMt3E911uShipping : $15 worldwide with trackingEscrow accepted, winner pays fees.
